sense.def:
A pitch
je del zemljišča, ki je zaznamovan in na njem igrajo na primer nogomet, ragbi, kriket ali hokej.

To pitch something somewhere
pomeni tisto stvar nekam vreči z močnim skrbno odmerjenim metom.

seg.quote: He was pitching a penny at a crack in the sidewalk.

sense.def:
To pitch to the ground
pomeni nenadoma pasti naprej.

seg.quote: He suddenly pitched headlong to the ground.

sense.def:
The pitch of a sound
pomeni, kako visok ali nizek je zvok.

seg.quote: Her voice dropped to a lower pitch.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj doseže
a high pitch
, doseže visoko raven ali stopnjo.

seg.quote: Excitement is now at fever pitch.
Her frustration mounted to such a pitch of anger that she could no longer keep silent.

sense.def:
To pitch something at a particular level
pomeni naravnati nekaj na določeno stopnjo.

seg.quote: Her lectures are pitched directly at the level of the students.

sense.def:
To pitch a tent
pomeni postaviti šotor.

To pitch in
pomeni vključiti se v neko dejavnost;

seg.quote: They will be expected to pitch in and make their own beds.
